about_the_game:
In this free version of Dungeon Tycoon, you have complete freedom to build and manage your own dungeon. You not only design the layout, but choose the best places for whatever traps you decide to use, which monsters you will hire to face the heroes, and what treasures await those skilled enough to claim victory. Dungeon Tycoon is all about capitalizing on every second of every hero's adventure in your mighty dungeon.

Game Features


  • Create and design a devious dungeon to give the heroes from across the land an exciting adventure experience.
  • Summon and upgrade powerful creatures to challenge heroes in their pursuit to find the treasures that lay within the dungeon.
  • Research new stuff to unlock new ways of improving your dungeon.
  • Enhance the aesthetics of your dungeon with a variety of different decorative and cosmetic items.
  • Inspect and watch your visitors to see how you can further improve your design.
  • Sell potions and other various aids to your visitors.

Prologue Content


  • 14 playable days
  • 4 unique visitor classes with distinct skills
  • 10+ monsters to collect and upgrade
  • 30+ researches to complete
  • 40+ objects and items to unlock
  • 6 unique enchantments to unlock that can spice up the gameplay
  • Procedurally generated quests with over 20+ unique rewards
  • 2 fierce realms to summon monsters from
detailed_description:
🎴 CHECK THE FULL GAME

The full game is now out on Steam!


About the Game

In this free version of Dungeon Tycoon, you have complete freedom to build and manage your own dungeon. You not only design the layout, but choose the best places for whatever traps you decide to use, which monsters you will hire to face the heroes, and what treasures await those skilled enough to claim victory. Dungeon Tycoon is all about capitalizing on every second of every hero's adventure in your mighty dungeon.

name: Dungeon Tycoon: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 350 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Build your own dungeon and attract heroes from all over the realm in this free version of Dungeon Tycoon. Grow your business by exploiting every facet of your visitors' dungeon exploration experience. Will you be able to keep your evil dungeon business going?
